text: Caroline Aaron (earlier: Caroline Sidney Abady; born August 7, 1952) is an American actress. She played the character of Martha Ingels in the 1992 movie This is My Life. She also played the part of Annie in 21 Jump Street (a 2012 action comedy). She has a number of other acting roles to her credit in both film and television. Aaron was born in Richmond, Virginia. ==Reference== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American movie producers Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Richmond, Virginia Category:Pseudonyms
title: Caroline Aaron
